title: Balance Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Macrobiotic, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe at Balance wellness club and spa. The food incorporates Ayuverdic concepts with macrobiotic and modern-day spa oriented nutrition. Separate ovo-lacto vegetarian section of the menu includes lasagna, risotto, mushroom masala. Vegan options include brown rice flour pancake with bean sprouts and shredded tofu, brown rice masala dosa, oat & veg upma, soups, dips, salads, and soba noodles. Vegetarian, gluten-free, dairy-free, nut items labelled.
